New Records: England became the first team to hold both the 50-over and 20-over World Cups simultaneously.
Sam Curran took 3 wickets in the match.
Shaheen Afridi was injured but returned to bowl.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi hobbled off the field after an injury.
Haris Rauf returned to bowl after a brief injury.
Phil Salt was dismissed via a run-out.
Babar Azam was dismissed by Adil Rashid.
Jos Buttler scored quickly at the start of England's innings.
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and chose to bowl.
Pakistan's team setup included Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan.
The match was significant for Pakistan as a potential historical win.
Post-Match Reflections: The win was a pivotal moment in England's tournament journey.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The MCG pitch was challenging with its large boundaries.
Adil Rashid's performance was crucial for England.
Others: The match was played in Melbourne, Australia.
The win marked England's second T20 World Cup triumph.
